turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order three large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to do the Buffalo chicken.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for all 3 pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 large buffalo chicken pizzas, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $72, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to make a change.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to change?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to have the thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for all 3?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i can add thin crust, that will not affect your total price.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Can you repeat my order, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, 3 large thin crust pizzas, all buffalo chicken.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is the $72 charge ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, would you like to dine in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it. Thank you for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)
